channel.title: Pages on Neil Grogan
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Neil Grogan

item.title: About
item.description: Software Engineering Manager at Ericsson in Athlone, Ireland, managing teams in JEE, UX, UI and 5G Topology. Before that, I was a Senior Software Engineer in MediaKind and Ericsson working across Java and C# projects. I originally graduated with a first class honours degree in computer science at Technological University, Dublin. I also graduated with a first class masters in computer science from University College Dublin. See the Colophon if you’re interested to know how I put this site together.

item.title: Colophon
item.description: This site is made with Hugo static website generator (using Noteworthy theme), posted to Github and hosted on FastMail. SSL is freely provided by LetsEncrypt. I author the site (usually) in the excellent Vim text editor, using Org mode/Markdown for posts and HTML/CSS/Javascript for the rest. An odd time I may write a post using Editorial on iOS.

item.title: Contact
item.description: My email is neil @ grogan dot ie. You can also send me encrypted mail using my pgp key. I also post a bit on Twitter. Linkedin Hackerrank PGP Info Key ID: 7FOF2D89 PGP Fingerpint: F12E 451D 87D9 4EE6 AFDFÂ 7F14 B495 8827 7F0F 2D89 Length: 4096 Created: 2016-08-21

item.title: CV
item.description: View and Download You can get a PDF copy of my resume.

item.title: Presentations
item.description: Below is some of the presentations I have given: 5G Overview - Maynooth University, October 2019 Newsfast M.Sc. Project Final (Speakerdeck Mirror) - University College Dublin, August 2015 Newsfast M.Sc. Project Midterm (Speakerdeck Mirror)- University College Dublin, June 2015

item.title: Projects
item.description: Some projects I’ve done are listed below, hopefully you can find some of them useful. AWS Lambda Web Scraper with Slack Notifications A function on Amazon Web Services Lambda platform to scrape useful information from a website and post the results to Slack. Can be used to get a restaurant menu, bus times, sports scores or anything you can think of in to Slack! AWS Lambda PDF to Text A function on Amazon Web Services Lambda platform to transform a PDF file in to the text it contains.
